figure_1.title: Fig. 1.
figure_1.caption: Figure 1. PRISMA flow diagram. CNKI: China National Knowledge Infrastructure; CBM: Chinese Biomedical Database.

claims.sentence: Of these, 74 were excluded because they did not provide separate HTx data, 17 were excluded due to errors in the research population, 60 were excluded for not reporting the targeted outcomes, 3 were excluded for containing document data from the same author, 4 were excluded as review articles, and 4 were excluded because the abstracts did not correspond to the full articles included (Fig. 1).

Open in a new tab
Figure 1.

Of these, 74 were excluded because they did not provide separate HTx data, 17 were excluded due to errors in the research population, 60 were excluded for not reporting the targeted outcomes, 3 were excluded for containing document data from the same author, 4 were excluded as review articles, and 4 were excluded because the abstracts did not correspond to the full articles included (Fig. 1).
